Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“Looks like Cid has{Line} some decent pawns.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“Looks like Cid has{Line} some decent pawns.”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“This is getting nowhere.{Line} Call the monsters.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“This is getting nowhere.{Line} Call the monsters.”

Monologue.Current: Help them{Line}Let them handle it
Monologue.Original: Help them{Line}Let them handle it

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“......”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“......”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Let’s get in there!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Let’s get in there!”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Oh my...”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Oh my...”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Can you stand up?”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Can you stand up?”

Monologue.Current: “Why are you helping me?{Line} I’m with the Garden Master...”
Monologue.Original: “Why are you helping me?{Line} I’m with the Garden Master...”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Stop being ridiculous. I don’t care{Line} whose side you’re on. We need to {Line} take care of those wounds now, you hear?”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Stop being ridiculous. I don’t care{Line} whose side you’re on. We need to {Line} take care of those wounds now, you hear?”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“{Char Squall},{Line} don’t just stand there.{Line} Give me a hand.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“{Char Squall},{Line} don’t just stand there.{Line} Give me a hand.”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“The headmaster isn’t here, so{Line} get out of here.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“The headmaster isn’t here, so{Line} get out of here.”

Monologue.Current: Nida{Line}“Hey, {Char Squall}.”
Monologue.Original: Nida{Line}“Hey, {Char Squall}.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Who are you?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Who are you?”

Monologue.Current: Nida{Line}“What!? Oh, man,{Line} it’s me.”{Next}“We passed the SeeD exam together.{Line} I can’t believe you forgot!”
Monologue.Original: Nida{Line}“What!? Oh, man,{Line} it’s me.”{Next}“We passed the SeeD exam together.{Line} I can’t believe you forgot!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Oh yeah...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Oh yeah...”

Monologue.Current: Nida{Line}“Gee...”
Monologue.Original: Nida{Line}“Gee...”

Monologue.Current: Nida{Line}“Well, it’s just like you to forget.”
Monologue.Original: Nida{Line}“Well, it’s just like you to forget.”

Monologue.Current: Nida{Line}“Go on.{Line} I got this{Line} place covered.”
Monologue.Original: Nida{Line}“Go on.{Line} I got this{Line} place covered.”

Monologue.Current: Nida{Line}“Sorry {Char Squall}.{Line} I can’t let you in now.”
Monologue.Original: Nida{Line}“Sorry {Char Squall}.{Line} I can’t let you in now.”

Monologue.Current: “The headmaster{Line} isn’t here.”
Monologue.Original: “The headmaster{Line} isn’t here.”

Monologue.Current: “This area is{Line} off-limits for now.”
Monologue.Original: “This area is{Line} off-limits for now.”

Monologue.Current: “Доброе утро!{Line} Что за прекрасный день!”
Monologue.Original: “Good morning!{Line} What a gorgeous day.”

Monologue.Current: “Доброе утро!{Line} Удачи на экзамене!”
Monologue.Original: “Good morning!{Line} Good luck with the SeeD exam.”

Monologue.Current: “Доброе утро!{Line} Поздравляю, ты теперь сид!”
Monologue.Original: “Good morning!{Line} Congratulation on becoming a SeeD!”

Monologue.Current: “Тебе тоже нужно{Line} поговорить с доктором?..”
Monologue.Original: “Do you need{Line} to talk to Dr. Kadowaki, too?”

Monologue.Current: “Надеюсь, я ещё не надоела{Line} доктору Кадоваки...”
Monologue.Original: “Dr. Kadowaki counselled me{Line} again today.”

Monologue.Current: “(вздох) Надо прекращать{Line} так тяжко вздыхать!{Line} Это угнетает. (вздох)”
Monologue.Original: “Sigh...{Line} I should stop sighing so much.{Line} It gets me down.”

Monologue.Current: “Наверное, мне стоит{Line} проконсультироваться{Line} с доктором Кадоваки...”
Monologue.Original: “Maybe I should go talk to{Line} Dr. Kadowaki...”

Monologue.Current: “Если ты чувствуешь недомогание,{Line} нужно сразу обратиться к варчу,{Line} пока это не вылилось во что-нибудь{Line} серьёзное!”
Monologue.Original: “It’s important to cure colds{Line} before they become something serious.”

Monologue.Current: “Ты должен беречь себя, слышишь?”
Monologue.Original: “You should always take care of{Line} yourself, you hear?”

Monologue.Current: “Я люблю бродить{Line} по нашему саду...”
Monologue.Original: “I like taking a walk{Line} around the Garden{Line} like this.”

Monologue.Current: “Доброе утро.{Line} Сыграем в карты?”{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: “Good morning.{Line} You’d like to play some cards?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: You need 5 or more{Line}cards to play.
Monologue.Original: You need 5 or more{Line}cards to play.

Monologue.Current: Nida{Line}“A card game?{Line} At a time like this?”
Monologue.Original: Nida{Line}“A card game?{Line} At a time like this?”

Monologue.Current: Nida{Line}“Okay, let’s play!”{Line}Yes{Line}No
Monologue.Original: Nida{Line}“Okay, let’s play!”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: You need 5 or more{Line}cards to play.
